name: REVV Motorsport
introduce: REVV Motorsport is a connected blockchain gaming motorsport ecosystem that uses the REVV ERC-20 token as the main currency for purchase and utility. REVV is designed to enable true digital ownership of game assets, giving players freedom and control over their NFT in-game items across a growing metaverse of racing games. REVV Motorsport ecosystem has varied P2E gameplay experiences, including Formula E: High Voltage, REVV Racing, MotoGP Ignition.
